description: ES: Pivot a query when there are too many columns to scroll sideways through.
body:
DECLARE @stmt nvarchar(MAX) = N'SELECT
    P.[key] as ColumnName,
    P.value as ColumnValue
FROM
    (' +
N'
$SELECTEDTEXT$
'
+ N' FOR JSON AUTO, WITHOUT_ARRAY_WRAPPER, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES) AS SQL(JSON)
CROSS APPLY 
    OPENJSON(SQL.JSON) AS P;';
EXECUTE sys.sp_executesql @stmt = @stmt;
